title: (20400) Tolosa - 910 Usabal Auzoa
description: Free parking Sports area Usabai. removed from the center of Tolosa, close to the N 1. noisy due to the passage of vehicles of the National

title: (20400) Tolosa - 15C Iurramendi Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Parking without services, not exclusive for motorhomes. Located in quiet neighborhood residential area near the Camino de Santiago. Few places, there are mostly cars

title: (20400) Usabal - 109 Usabal Auzoa Auzoa
description: Industrial area parking, fairly supervised, a little noisy but a stone's throw from the San Ignacio workshop for caravans

title: (20400) Tolosa - 30 San Esteban Auzoa
description: Motorhome area just minutes from the historic center of the municipality. With a rich historical and cultural heritage, Tolosa is well known for its cuisine and typical local products. To find motorhome Aire pass the two carparks into industrial area. You will find services on left and parking on right.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 23B Lugar Barrio San Esteban
description: Municipal motorhome area near the center without shade.

title: (20400) San Blas - 904 Iruña Hiribidea
description: Huge parking aside road, but not noisy,

title: (20400) Tolosa - 31 San Blas Auzoa Auzoa
description: Asphalt parking next to the town and next to the road.

title: (20400) Ibarra - 1 Egialde Aldea
description: Parking outside the school, on weekends a very quiet place. There is a picnic area with tables, rubbish bins, a fountain and a barbecue.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 13 Izaskungo Aldapa
description: Level ground parking in a very quiet place with very nice views towards the mountains of Tolosa

title: (20268) Altzo - 89 Txaparre Aldea Barreiatua
description: Village car park, behind the pediment and next to the very nicely decorated school. Quiet, lit by a few lampposts, with a nice view. Next to it, the statue of the giant character of Altzo who was born in this town and was famous for being over 2.20 m high.

title: (20270) Irura - 5 Zillar Kalea
description: Next to the motorway, perfect for a night when you are travelling. Nice for water change. There is a family oriented bar/restaurant first floor where you can have lunch/dinner. Free Wifi in the bar. Park for children and traditional basque pelota (trinquete) matches can be seen from the restaurant. Motorhome friendly owner.

title: (20490) Lizartza - 9 Askatasunaren Plaza
description: Parking to be able to stop to rest, see the town. We did not stay to sleep in the camper. Very quiet town you will only hear the sheep and roosters in the area.

title: (20494) Alkiza - 15E Alkiza Plaza
description: Spacious and quiet parking next to the cemetery of the village of Alkiza. there are beautiful views of the valleys and Basque hamlets and Mount Ernio

title: (20269) Orendain - Egileor Aldea
description: Ibiur reservoir dam, very close to the a1, beautiful road around the reservoir, ideal for spending the night on the road. Access by road to baliarrain. Do not go under the dam following the gps.

title: (20150) Villabona - Legarreta Auzoa
description: Beautiful, quiet park with shops and bars to visit, bike path and the train station nearby to visit San Sebastian.

title: (20496) Bidania-Goiatz - 25 Calle Agerre
description: Very quiet place without services but with spectacular views. There are no services but if you like spending the night on your own and you are en route, it is a very good alternative to be calm, especially if you go with children since you have a park nearby.

title: (20490) Orexa - 9A Errebote Plaza
description: It is an ideal place to stop and see the town. I recommend it because it is a beautiful town, the guy from the restaurant bar next door is a charm and cooks very well.

title: (20150) Zizurkil - 17 Ernio Bidea
description: Quiet parking for the night and day. gravel parking, is level, has street lighting and garbage containers. shops, bars and square 100 meters

title: (20150) Villabona - 35X Lugar Barrio Otelarre
description: Esplanade of land next to the door of the Hika Winery. The winery is visited and they are very friendly. Space for more than 20 vehicles with no clearance limit.

title: (20150) Villabona - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area "Komizar" with picnic tables and barbecues. Narrow paved road.

title: (20159) - 910 Zilar Kalea
description: Parking of all kinds of vehicles, on the outskirts of town. With shadow. Silent A route leaves right next to

title: (20159) Asteasu - 7 Ibarrazpi Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Ideal place to rest and spend a weekend to discover their customs and gastronomy. Car park. From the village you can go hiking in the mountains such as "Ernio" ... a real luxury.

title: (20159) Asteasu - 6 Eliz Kalea
description: Quiet, parking in the Center of Asteasu.

title: (20159) - 909 Lugar Zizurkil Nucleo
description: Parking at the entrance of Zizurkil Arriba. Very quiet, next to a church and the road. Few noises at night, cars do not usually pass, except at rush hour when there is a bit more hustle and bustle. Have we ever seen motorhomes stay overnight as well. Good views.

title: (20492) Berastegi - 1 Elizalde Auzoa
description: Parking next to the huge village church in centre of rural valley. Quiet place without services. PR marked walk around valley starts here, as well as another short walk. Completely flat. Some amenities in village.

title: (20259) Baliarrain - 1 Herriz Gora Aldea
description: Quiet place, with water, tables, barbecue, swings. routes and spectacular views

title: (20250) Legorreta - 2 Garikano Auzoa Auzoa
description: Gas station. Bar Restaurant. 3rd showers. We can fill the water too. No emptying for water

title: (20150) Villabona - 7C Agaraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Cepsa service station. Open 24 hours. Small Carrefour supermarket and clean toilets. Showers

title: (20809) Aia - 12A Iruretaegia Auzoa Auzoa
description: Wonderful starting point for hiking and mountaineering. Lots of local walkers on weekends. Deafeningly quiet at night. Flat asphalt to stand on. Sun and shade.

title: (20268) Amezketa - 17 Altunegiko Auzoa
description: Quiet place to spend the night with a van. Picnic with tables, fountain and WC. There is a small bar. Hiking trails can be arranged. The site is small, not suitable for motorhomes.

title: (20159) Asteasu - GI-2631
description: Zona de picnic

title: (20140) Andoain - 53W Leizotz Auzoa
description: Parking giving access to the Leizaran valley. Ideal for mountain biking and fishing.

title: (20140) Andoain - 2 Txitibar Plaza
description: Self-service laundry with washing machines and dryers. There is also a dog washing station. Open Monday to Sunday 8AM-22PM. Supermarket, bars and restaurants around.

title: (20269) Abaltzisketa - 11A Larraitz Auzoa
description: Parking night and day, picnic area, WC

title: (20140) Andoain - 1 Sorabilla Auzoa
description:
Parking in the polygon,
access to the town in 5'.
No services.
Close to the highway, a bit noisy.
Little fuss on the weekend,
midweek things will change!!!!

title: (20140) Andoain - 15 Extremadura Kalea
description: Parking without services in the upper part of Andoain. Level. Very calm. Easy access. Close to the cycle route.

title: (20140) Andoain - 19 Kale Nagusia Kalea
description: DO Laundry self-service laundry

title: (20140) Andoain - Txistoki Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Very quiet parking in town. Good access from the N1 and easy to park. Services of all kinds within walking distance (supermarket, greengrocer, butcher, cafeteria...) Perfect for spending a night, stocking cupboards and getting to know Andoain and the Leizaran natural park and its 25 km greenway by bike. You cannot park on Tuesday and Saturday mornings as there is a market.

title: (20492) Berastegi - Aintzerga Auzoa
description: Parking, picnic area URTOKO ZUBIETA Quiet, shaded, picnic tables, barbecues, river, playground, fountain, WC open from Easter.

title: (20739) Beizama - Unnamed Road
description: A little further along than the original site is an access point for fishing and, I presume, to launch boats. There is level parking up top for a single van, maybe two.  It’s at the 1km marker.  We spent 4 nights here and explored San Sebastián and Bilbao on day trips.  Very private with dog walkers and the like your only company.

title: () Beizama - Amenabar Auzoa
description: Peaceful night at the edge of the Ibaieder dam. Location for van or van.

title: (20240) Ordizia - 11 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Parking next to the Eroski supermarket and gas station. No loading or unloading services very close to the town with a beautiful old town. On Wednesdays there is a market that has been held for 500 years

title: (20730) Azpeitia -
description: Lakeside with mountain views. Winding road, and sometimes with lots of greenery. Calm and restful.

title: (20247) Zaldivia - 904 Kalea Santa Fe
description: Free parking in Zaldibia, next to the Sierra de Aralar, with 2 fountains nearby, several playgrounds for children and walk on the river with weight machines. The town has public baths nearby and several bars / restaurants, butcher shop ... Very quiet area and close to various mountain outings and mountain biking.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - Eizagirre Auzoa
description: Roadside near the lake but with enough space to settle and enjoy the peace and greenery. tranquility assured.

title: (20240) Ordizia - 1 Oiangurenaldea
description: Oiangu Park and picnic area. public baths and in txiringito versno

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 306 Eizagirre Auzoa Auzoa
description: A small car park on the side of the road will accommodate 3-4 motor homes. A water stream is running around the car park creating a very pleasant sound. Quiet at night good for overnight stay.

title: (31877) Gorriti - Area de Servicio
description: Rest area No service. Toilets of the station.

title: (20809) Aia - 15 Joan Etorle Kalea
description: Children's playground, Parking hosteleria

title: (20130) Urnieta - S/N Barrio Ergoyen
description: Shell gas station for trucks (and cars) with the possibility to take a shower

title: (20210) Lazkao - 925 Iturgaitzaga Kalea
description: Parking next to the city

title: (20200) Beasain - Carretera Nacional
description:
Exit direction France: exit at the indication of the gas station and just past this there is a road that crosses the road below on the other side. exit in direction Madrid: exit 419 in the totonda 3rd exit and 20 meters on the left pass under the railway bridge.
There is a small blue area in the parking lot, but most of it is a free zone.
This is the parking lot of the ambulatory or health center. 2 minutes walk is the center of the town with pintxos bars and the entire commercial area. 200 meters away at the gas station there is the other point for emptying water.

title: (20200) Beasain - 2B A-1
description: Repsol service station, draining gray and black water, filled with drinking water. If you refuel it is free, otherwise the service costs. Totally recommended.

title: (20210) Lazkao - 1 Lazkao Barreiatua
description: Cool park in summer made up of oak trees by the river. Accessible site, with free parking 20 meters away, ideal for walking on a flat track, with picnic areas and benches, a fountain and a fenced area for dogs to play. Located in front of one of the most beautiful historical complexes in Euskalherria.

title: (20170) Donostia - 14 Abalotz Errepidea
description: Gas station with shower available, just ask for the key at the cash desk at the express junction.

title: (20200) Beasain - 47 Nafarroa Etorbidea
description: Nice and clean laundry open from 8:00-22:00. There are 2 machines of 10kg and 2 of 20kg and 2 dryers

title: (31877) Gorriti - NA-4011
description: Hardly traveled road. We have spent the night here, on a small esplanade next to the small road. Very quiet to sleep. No services. Cattle are heard and we saw a small deer.

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: On a hill, but we managed to sleep very well for one night. Light traffic during the night.

title: (31880) Leitza - Patxi Arrazola Kalea
description: Former train station Plazaola. Along the Greenway. Quiet parking for day and night. Next to the fountain. Small only for van. Super 4G reception, no shadow.

title: (20130) Urnieta - 33B Barrio Ergoyen
description: Fantastic parking lot with stunning views. Although the track may seem narrow, it is still as it was at the beginning. it does not shrink at any time.

title: (31880) Leitza - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful area where you can stop to eat and have a good day, it is a good starting point for various excursions. There is a fountain, several tables and a river where you can bathe. You can leave the motorhome on the side of the road or drive it almost to the grass in the case of a van. We did not dare because the ground is somewhat uneven. I don't know if you can stay overnight. There was a sign not to leave belongings in sight in the vehicles due to the risk of theft.

title: (20200) Beasain - 1 Igartza Oleta Kalea
description: Motorhome friendly Shops just in the front building. Bar Akelarre (Nice txorizo tapas) Zuhaizpe bar(opening 6 AM) nice breakfast, lunch/dinner for less than a fiver. Saltsamendi butcher is famous for their blood sausage. Free Wifi (akelarre bar)Service area with tokens to be taken from local merchants

title: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 8 Oria Etorbidea
description: No picture and it's really a shame. SUPER STOP BATHING so I recommend! Just go up the river via the small park, go under the 4 lanes and we land on a beautiful spot for swimming in the wilderness in 5 minutes walk from the car park. Not tested to spend the night but parking that seems quite discreet and protect from the road by a building.

title: (20218) Beasain - 34 Barrio Arriaran
description: It may depend on the height of the water in the swamp. You can get to the shore itself. The entrance is a bit steep but at the bottom there is room to turn around.

title: (31880) Leitza - 12 Polígono P II - Landa
description: Parking by the river, there are swings for the kids. 200 meters from the village

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 81 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Galp gas station with showers

name: Camping Zingira
title: (20809) Camping Zingira
description: Very quiet, surrounded by nature, with lots of shade, large separate plots with hedges, very attentive staff, very clean bathrooms. Very recommendable but expensive.

title: (20809) -
description: Toilets closed. don't crap around the place it's really disgusting. small effort to buy a (foldable) spade and dig yourself a pit in the woods.

title: (20130) Urnieta - 22 Errekalde Kalea
description:
it is a very quiet car park. To start the visit of Mount Adarra.
La última semana de septiembre y la primera de octubre is occupied by the ferias de las fiestas del pueblo.

title: (20212) Olaberria - 6 Gainera Auzoa
description: Quiet recreational area next to residential area. It has several benches with tables, a fountain and a wastebasket. Please respect the environment and collect your rubbish. Leave the place better than you found it.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 906 Lugar Barrio Urdaiaga
description: Shaded picnic area

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: Very nice parking lot for a break. Unfortunately with a height limit of 1.85 m. There is space for 1-2 larger cars in front of it. Lots of shaded picnic tables and playground. Also a good place to start hikes.

title: (20212) Olaberría - 927 Calle Zebazelai
description: Picnic area in one of the most beautiful viewpoints in Goierri, between the Aizkorri and Aralar mountains. It has a fountain, tables, barbecue, and public toilets a few meters away. From here you can make beautiful excursions. Nice urban farmhouse, with two highly appreciated restaurants in the region.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 13 Urdaiaga Auzoa
description: Very quiet picnic area with about 15 relatively level places for motorhomes <6m. Approach relatively steep but fixed. Great view of the hilly landscape. Very quiet except for the nearby church bell.

title: (20730) Azpeitia -
description: New filling and emptying area (gray and black) in Azpeitia. Overnight accommodation is allowed (3 nights maximum).  It is right next to a large field with picnic tables, etc. A bit out of the center, but to be free ...

title: (31891) Azpirotz - Autovía de Leizarán
description: Parking along the highway to access the Mirador de Azpiroz. No services except 4G

title: (20810) Aia - 57 Olaskoegia Auzoa
description: It is a quiet parking lot, it does not put in any carter forbidden to park to sleep, I suppose that being a town and being far from the city there is no problem. A very quiet place near the Orio town, a place with a lot of charm. We spent the night and rested very well.

title: (20809) -
description: Quiet site with picnic tables and a barbecue. Surrounded by nature.

title: (20170) - 902 Lugar Barrio Urdaiaga
description: Parking next to a river in a small village. Railway tracks next door. A lot of nature.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 4 Errekaldea Kalea
description: Behind an industrial area along the river ... has very quiet shade. Perfect for a picnic pose I think we could spend the night there but not tempted ..

title: (20211) Ataún - 918 Elbarrena Auzoa
description: Parking in the same town access walks along the bank of the beautiful river as well as tracks to go to the very quiet town without sleeping problems do not forget to buy cheese at the bar

title: (20170) Donostia - 6 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Large free parking with shade located 200 m from the town next to horse race track. Only busy on race days. Cycle path to cycle the 8km to San Sebastian beach but this town has plenty of shops and bars anyway.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 911 Paseo Gernika
description: Parking in the center of town, in front of the sports center. It has several places. We have spent the night without any problem. Next there is a dog camp. Source outside the sports center.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 25 Izarraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Very ample parking at the edge of the road to rest, spend the night or something on the way.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 3 Diseminados Usurbil Barreiatua
description: Water fountain and 10 parking spaces

title: (20212) Gipuzkoa - 22W Lugar Harizti Industrialdea
description: BP service station. You can buy the 12 kg gas cylinders. The greats of Repsol. It has toilets and showers (at least for truckers, I don't know if for the rest). It has a Maxi China in front of it.

title: (20810) Orio -
description:
Very quiet place and spectacular location
Along the way there are areas where you can park well

title: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 3 Hipodromo Etorbidea-Avda del Hipodromo Hiribidea
title_short: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 3 Hipodromo Etorbidea-Avda del Hipodromo Hiribidea
description: LavaXpres self service laundromat. Washing 30min small 4.5e big 8e. Drying 30min small 4.5e big 5.50e. Detergent and softener 0.5e each or bring your own. Open every day 8-22.

title: (20211) Astigarraga - 3W Lugar Barrio Astigarraga
description: Sports hall parking. During the day, the sports center is open and has a toilet.

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description:
Along a small quiet road and the river.

/!\ Saw a police car during the day who told us not to spend the night there.

title: (20120) Hernani - 5 Santa Barbara Auzoa
description: Nook at the edge of a busy road. A wooden bench to enjoy the view. Sloping. No services. Close to the Santa Bárbara climbing spot. Noise from the highway but light at night depending on your insulation. Other nooks are accessible all along the road to the hermitage (chapel). Some a little flatter near the retaurant, for some less sheltered from the wind but with fewer trees hiding the view;)

title: (20810) Orio - Lugar Ortzaika Aldea, 901
description: 10 dedicated motorhome spaces provided by council in small car park just of main road. No black or grey dump but steps down to River and a drinking water fountain. Very handy base to walk or cycle along pretty river path to Orio town or on further to beach.  2 night max stay. Restaurant and waste bins opposite.

title: (20809) Aia - 1 Arratola Aldea Auzoa
description: Parking under train station right next to the bridge that leads to the bar area. Suitable for vans. Public bath in the same street. Gratuitous.

title: (20160) Gipuzkoa - 13W Bidea Illarraltzueta
description: Parking at the back of the cemetery. Slight slope.

title: (20810) - 18W Lugar Ortzaika Aldea
description: Parking on the right from St Sébastien between the wine cellar and a restaurant opposite the parking below, already mentioned

title: (20170) Usurbil - 38 Kalezar Auzoa
description: Quiet place next to a soccer field to park and spend the night. It is ideal if you want to enjoy Guipuzcoan gastronomy, since it is at the entrance of the Sidrería Saizar.

title: (20809) Aia - 1 Ubegun Industrigunea
description: Day/night parking exactly on the opposite of the cheapest gas station in the area. Not romantic but ok go an overnight stay.

title: (20809) Aia - 11 Urdaneta Auzoa Barreiatua
description: Parkingplace at side of the road. Bit noisy of cars coming by. But beautifull view in the morning of zarautz.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 902 Bidea Loiolako Ignazio Hiribidea
description: Quiet parking in a residential area and close to a walk from the town in one direction and from the sanctuary in another. We were there during the day but there are no prohibitions on spending the night.

title: (20810) Orio - 901 Etorbidea Aita Lertxundi
description: Unlimited public parking, in front of the river, public bathrooms leaving the parking lot towards the river promenade next to the exercise machine park.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 20 Loiolako Inazio Hiribidea
description: Small car park next to a monument and away from the main street. The neighbors park their vehicles and motorhomes there. Very close to the Loiola Sanctuary. We were quiet despite our proximity to the city.

title: (20810) Orio - 12 Ibai-Ondo Ibilbidea
description: Self-service laundry

title: (20810) Laurgain - 19Y Vial Camino Laurgain
description:
Parking 4 places for the night. seen on the river, but close to a busy road. relatively quiet night (just a dog barking all night)
good for a stopover

title: (20120) Hernani - 902 Kalea Antsorena Anaien
description:
Esplanade in this town that can fit motorhomes and campervan cars. It is dirt but it is level.
Close to San Sebastián and there is not much noise.
Put yourself on the side of the wall better than on the one with the trees since there are more bugs there.

title: (20128) Ereñotzu - GI-3410
description: Parking on the side of the road, along a river. Pleasant, a bit of traffic.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 26 Loiolako Inazio Hiribidea
description: [EUSKAL HERRIA ezagutzen] This is the school car park. Next to it there are tables and benches where you can eat... There are public toilets and a water tap. Don't forget not to throw any trash on the ground, let's take care of the environment! See you soon!

title: (20120) Hernani - 2 Santa Barbara Auzoa
description: Nice quiet parking lot directly below the Sankt Barbara chapel. The driveway is a bit steep but the view is nice (despite the industry). Sloping throughout the area, but possible without ramps with the help of the curb.

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 923 Lugar Barrio Txikierdi
description: This free parking space for 4 caravans is located next to Urbil Shopping Centre in Usurbil. It's open from 9:30am to 24:00am.

title: (20120) Hernani - 7B Antsorena Anaien Kalea
description: Parking with a field next door and you can spend the night there. recommended in cider production season.

title: (20730) Loiola - 2 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Perfect parking for visiting the Basilica of Loiola, there is no problem to spend the night. From the neighboring bidegorri you reach the center in 10 minutes. 4h maximum parking

title: (31754) Arano -
description: Parking at the edge of the road to access the Urumea river, about 6 cars. calm

title: (20730) Loiola - 10 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Lawn Sanctuary parking, well located and quiet for sleeping

title: (31880) Arkiskil - Carretera Leitza - Santesteban
description: A small shaded place to picnic, altitude approximately 700m, at the Usateguieta pass. Beautiful view of the surrounding mountains.

title: (20810) Orio - 16 Baxoalde Kalea
description: Large public car park next to the estuary promenade, a playground and an Eroski. Spacious with many seats and several vans sleeping. We spent a quiet night from Saturday to Sunday. Public toilets on one side

title: (20216) Ormaiztegi - 27-31 San Andres Kalea
description: Parking without services. Very quiet for night and day. In front of the Zumalakarregi Museum.

title: (20730) Loiola - 16 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Parking on the right of the Basilica. Quiet, shaded, bike path. Toilets and garbage cans.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 18 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Perfect to spend the night I was talking to the police that happens often. This next to the other Parking that is the hotel but that is very small, this is better for our motorhomes.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 901 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking of a football stadium. At the foot of the 4 lanes. A 30 minute walk to the beach of Zarautz (10 minutes by bike). Picnic area near the parking. The police let us parked for lack of a campsite (all full).

title: (20810) Orio - 13 Estropalari Kalea
description: Parking under highway bridge a bit noisy but perfect for spending the night. From 8:00 p.m. free. Beautiful to visit the surroundings, parks for children.

title: (20810) Orio - 39 Abaromendi Kalea
description: The parking space of the mobile home is payable. Paying to park under a road bridge, located at a roundabout, quite noisy. The view of the nearby marina and proximity to the beach make up for that, so overall ok. The services are free - many thanks to the municipality for that.

title: (20810) Orio - 44 Abaromendi Kalea
description: Municipal parkplace with dedicated places for camping-cars. Good access to the beach, restaurant nearby.

title: (20018) Donostia - 46 De Errekalde Hiribidea
description: Small parking near the Mercadona and McDonald. Free for night.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 630 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking under the AP-8 to one side of the football field. the only drawback is the noise from the cars passing over the bridge

title: (20018) Lasarte-Oria - Fernando Mugica Kalea
description: We only had dinner here after going to the nearby supermercado and then moved on. But it seemed like a good place to sleep. It’s a giant parking lot in front of the Decathlon.

title: (20120) Hernani - 62W Zikuñaga Bailara
description: It's not the greatest place in an industrial area but it's good enough for one night and quiet.

title: (20120) Hernani - 26 Akerregi Bailara
description: Parking next to the gas station in the industrial area. Quiet at night, because the gas station is closed.

title: (20120) Hernani - 7 Agustindarren Plaza
description: Self-service laundry. Hours Monday to Saturday from 8-22 hours. Sunday I am not clear.

title: (20709) Guipúzcoa - 15 Ezkio Diseminado Barreiatua
description: Parking of the farm Igartubeiti, is a museum of caserio with an interpretation center. It is an ideal visit with children to understand the way of life of our ancestors. Free parking and no prohibitions is a small parking but PERFECT to spend a quiet night in the countryside. There are stone benches. The interpretation center has some services.

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description: Large unpaved parking, isolated and quiet. A walk takes you to the marina and the lighthouse. Very nice and quaint. The beach is closed, it is not accessible .. glass box.

title: (20128) Lugar - 55W Lugar Barrio Ereñotzu
description: Parking for 5-6 cars in a hiking area in the Aiako Harria Natural Park. Very nice and easy walk (when we were there there were several families with children). On the hill, in addition to magnificent views, you can see the Sagastieta Dolmen (there are also others in the area). At the beginning of the path on the right, after about 200m you will reach the Akola picnic area, with several wooden tables, grills and a fountain.

name: Orio Kanpina
title: (20810) Orio Kanpina
description:
Small campsite with swimming pool. Sea at 200 meters. Super equipped, very clean with all the comfort and necessary possible including mini-market and restaurant! acsi card accepted. friendly staff and near the village on foot 10 mins.

discount card is not accepted in july and august

title: (20120) Hernani - 21 Jauregi Bailara
description: Parking y parque del Centro Orona Ideo.

title: (20120) Hernani - 39A Antziola Auzoa
description: Hernani pool parking. Quiet and bright place. No services.

VW T4 with rear box is almost too long.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 8 Kasino Kalea

title: (20800) Zarautz - 28 Iturribidea Kalea
description: Parking space in a quiet residential area for 20 euros/24h. About 7 minutes from the beach and 3 minutes walk from the old town. Plenty of parking available but often occupied. Good chances of getting a parking space, especially in the morning and afternoon. Lots of police presence, felt very safe there.

name: Gran Camping Zarautz
title: (20800) Gran Camping Zarautz
description: It's on a hill = great views of the coast and Zarautz! Very clean toilets and showers. easy reservation, great extension. 15 minutes from the beach (down 439 steps / 100 meters in altitude) with a wonderful view of the pretty town with a beautiful promenade. The terrain slopes gently far into the sea and is therefore ideal for children!

title: (20008) Donostia - 151 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea

To take the public bus from the campsite stop, download the d-bus app and it will tell you the bus arrival time at the stop. Very practical.

There are several routes for walking, going to the mountains or cycling.
